name: Mira's Tools
tagline: A small collection of things I've found helpful
body:
# Network Security Mixed Bag of Tools
This a collection of tools and code snippets that I have personally used in my recon and in securing variety of networks. 

## Get Unstuck
Small programs that help with somewhat common issues. 

[ ]TBD


## Cleaning Data
### Small Regex
Here are some oddly specific Regex snippits. If you are unfamiliar with regular expression [here's a lovely intro from RexEgg](https://www.rexegg.com/regex-quickstart.html) 

Selecting the directories at the end of a URL domain name:


```
(/+.*$)
```


Selecting URL's from a list of IP addresses:

```
(.+[a-z]+.$)
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
